item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 25, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Bitwarden SDK relicensed from proprietary to GPLv3 (539 points | 200 comments)
2. Quantized Llama models with increased speed and a reduced memory footprint (393 points | 96 comments)
3. OpenFeature – a vendor-agnostic, community-driven API for feature flagging (98 points | 26 comments)

5. A Primer on Vintage Cassette Decks: How to Find a Good One (35 points | 34 comments)
6. Inserting a 0 bit in the middle of a value (8 points | 2 comments)

8. Yes, we did discover the Higgs (49 points | 13 comments)
9. Security research on Private Cloud Compute (247 points | 87 comments)
10. Never Missing the Train Again (265 points | 96 comments)
11. Smarter Than 'Ctrl+F': Linking Directly to Web Page Content (6 points | 4 comments)
12. Brush – A new compatible Gaussian splatting engine (135 points | 38 comments)
13. Post World War II Food (212 points | 173 comments)
14. Zigler: Zig NIFs in Elixir (188 points | 63 comments)
15. ST Book, the Notebook Atari ST (65 points | 30 comments)

19. TLA from First Principles (41 points | 7 comments)

22. A Modern CSS Reset (2024 update) (8 points | 2 comments)
23. Calculating the norm of a complex number (47 points | 28 comments)
24. The Lion of St. Mark's Square in Venice Is Chinese (150 points | 48 comments)
25. Show HN: TypeSchema – A JSON specification to describe data models (91 points | 39 comments)
26. Show HN: RF Hunter – Find hidden cameras and other devices (472 points | 146 comments)
27. Species in Pieces (55 points | 5 comments)
28. Show HN: Rust based AWS Lambda Logs Viewer (TUI) (37 points | 9 comments)
29. When Samsung meets MediaTek: the story of a small bug chain [pdf] (41 points | 4 comments)
30. Boeing 787s must be reset every 51 days or 'misleading data' is shown (2020) (165 points | 163 comments)
